<h1 class="govuk-heading-xl govuk-!-margin-top-6 govuk-!-margin-bottom-6">Forms and Actions</h1>

<div class="govuk-form-group">
 <label for="userText" class="govuk-label govuk-label--m">
    Word Count
 </label>
 <span id="userText-hint" class="govuk-hint">
   Enter your text. The number of words will update as you type.
 </span>
 <textarea
    id="userText"
    name="userText"
    class="govuk-textarea govuk-!-margin-top-6 govuk-!-margin-bottom-6"
    aria-describedby="userText-hint wordCount"
    rows="8"
    style="width:100%; max-width:100%;"
    spellcheck="true"
    autocomplete="off"
    inputmode="text"
  ></textarea>
</div>
<div
  id="wordCount"
  class="govuk-hint"
  aria-live="polite"
  tabindex="0"
>
  Word count: 0
</div>

<script>
function countWords(str) {
  str = str.trim();
  if (!str) return 0;
  // Split on any sequence of whitespace
  return str.split(/\s+/).length;
}
const textarea = document.getElementById('userText');
const countDisplay = document.getElementById('wordCount');
textarea.addEventListener('input', function() {
  countDisplay.textContent = "Word count: " + countWords(this.value);
});
</script>
